entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Gravenhurst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 3:28 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.6°C
Pressure: 97.8 kPa
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -6.1°C
Wind: SW 35 km/h gust 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Blizzard developing this evening. Local snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:52 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:52 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow in the evening. Local amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:52 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
